ProjectTitle: Effective mechanotherapy in early osteoarthritis through modulation of Wnt-induced integrin/cytoskeleton axis dysregulation.
InitialFeedbackHistory: 20/04/2023 Please note that you used an older DMP template, FWO now uses the [REDACTED] standard DMP template that you can find in DMPonline.be or on the FWO website: https://www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/. Please use this template for your future DMPs [REDACTED] you mention an ECD number from 2018, these are normally valid for 4-5 years, are you applying for a new protocol or will you only use cells obtained earlier under this number?
